findSql.name: crmToSOMMigration.findAllRunningProcessesForOrders_Quotes
findSql.label: Find All Running Processes For Orders & Quotes

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select {+*+} from cwprocess where process_id in ( select p.process_id from cwprocess_not_completed p, cwmdtypes t where p.status not in (3, 6) and p.process_metadatype = t.typeid and t.typename in ('stcw.submitOrder', 'stcw.updateOrder', 'stcw.validateQuote'))
